Song.title: Heaven's Song
Song.copyright: Jeremy Riddle | Â© 2013 Bethel Music Publishing

Arrangement.text:
Note: Play in key A, Guitar capo 2 play in G
Intro: [Am | Am | C | C | Fmaj7 | Fmaj7 | D7 | D7 |]
Verse 1: [C]We have come as one heart As one voice to [Bb]join hea[F]ven's En[C]dless song on the earth Lifting up our [Bb]ador[F]ation To[C9]wards Your throne praises rise Songs of love are [Bb]now asc[F]ending [C9]For the King for the Lamb Who gave His life to [Bb]save [F]us
Chorus: [Am] Holy holy holy all of heaven [Cmaj7]cries Worthy worthy worthy for You were cruc[Fmaj7]ified [ ]The living creatures call out And all the elders [D7]fall down (They fall down)
Interlude: [Am | Am | C | C | Fmaj7 | Fmaj7 | D9 | D9 |]
Verse 2: A s[C]acrifice of living praise We bring our all for [Bb]You have be[F]ckoned [C]Us into a holy place A holy love Your [bb]very pre[F]sence And [C9]now we stand in wondrous awe A glory cry we [Bb]raise to h[F]eaven With [C9]holy hands and lifted hearts Our eyes upon our [Bb]Sav[F]ior
{new_page} Interlude: And w[Am]orship They w[Cmaj7]orship We [Fmaj7] wors[Dm]hip We wo[Am]rship We come and w[Cmaj7]orship We come to [Fmaj7] wors[Dm]hip
Bridge: (Singing) (We sing out) h[C]oly holy God most holy [Fmaj7]Worthy to receive all glory He[D9]aven's shouting as we glor[Fmaj7]ify (REPEAT)
[Am]Day and night and night and day We will worship We will worship [C]Day and night and night and day We will worship We will worship [F]Day and night and night and day We will worship We will worship [Dm]Day and night and night and day We will worship We will worship
Arrangement.searchtext: note play in key a guitar capo 2 play in g intro verse 1 we have come as one heart as one voice to join heavens endless song on the earth lifting up our adoration towards your throne praises rise songs of love are now ascending for the king for the lamb who gave his life to save us chorus holy holy holy all of heaven cries worthy worthy worthy for you were crucified the living creatures call out and all the elders fall down they fall down interlude verse 2 a sacrifice of living praise we bring our all for you have beckoned us into a holy place a holy love your very presence and now we stand in wondrous awe a glory cry we raise to heaven with holy hands and lifted hearts our eyes upon our savior interlude and worship they worship we worship we worship we come and worship we come to worship bridge singing we sing out holy holy god most holy worthy to receive all glory heavens shouting as we glorify repeat day and night and night and day we will worship we will worship day and night and night and day we will worship we will worship day and night and night and day we will worship we will worship day and night and night and day we will worship we will worship
